Metadata.Title: CVE-2007-4559 affecting package python3 for versions less than 3.9.19-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2007-4559 affecting package python3 for versions less than 3.9.19-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package python3 is installed with version 3.9.14-8 or earlier
